entries.content: I'm not here to convince you to buy from me. I'm here to figure out if I should sell to you.
entries.notes: Flips the dynamic, positions the seller as selective and high-value.

entries.content: Give prospects alternative solutions they could pursue instead of yours, then ask them to explain why those alternatives won't work for them.
entries.notes: Frames your solution as necessary because other options are insufficient for the prospect, without attacking the options themselves.

entries.content: Alternative: Just put your prices up. Challenge: Why can't you do that?
Alternative: Fire your worst salespeople / Hire better ones. Challenge: Why don't you want to do that?
Alternative: Consider coaching. Challenge: Why not?
Alternative: Outsource your sales functions. Challenge: Why don't you want to do that?
Get the prospect to convince you they need what you have because it works, rather than you proving why they need it.

focus_area: Competitive Objections: Unique value framing without attacking others
